original: Edwijn, Thorsten Edvin, direktör, Göteborg, f. 1/6/95 i Gbg av sjökapt. Edv. Bengtson o. Theresia Lörqvist. G. 23 m. Sigrid Hjärne. Barn: Ulla Margareta f. 24, g. m. adv. Gunnar La-berlöw, Gbg, Ingegerd Guniillia 219, Ingela Birgitta 33. — Realex. 11. Anst. v. Rederi A-B Transatlantic sed. 11, andre v. verks t. dir. där »ed. 33. Led. av ’Styr. f. Rederi A-B Transoil, Transmark o. Transkonc. bost :’Stift., suppl. i Styr. f. Rederi A-B Transatlantic, Rederi A-B Transpacific o. Förvaltn. A-B RABT.
translated: Edwijn, Thorsten Edvin, Director, Gothenburg, born June 1st, 1895 in Gothenburg to Captain Edv. Bengtson and Theresia Lörqvist. Married to Sigrid Hjärne in 1923. Children: Ulla Margareta, born in 1924, married to lawyer Gunnar La-berlöw in Gothenburg, Ingegerd Guniillia born in 1921, and Ingela Birgitta born in 1933. Completed secondary education at age 11. Employed by the shipping company Rederi A-B Transatlantic since 1911, serving as assistant to the managing director from 1933. Member of the board for Rederi A-B Transoil, Transmark and Transkonc., residing at 'Stift.' and serving as a substitute board member for Rederi A-B Transatlantic, Rederi A-B Transpacific, and Förvaltn. A-B RABT.
